meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tedious.
meanings.sent1: The tediousness of the task made it difficult to stay focused.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't bear the tediousness of the long, boring meeting.
meanings.sent3: The tediousness of folding laundry became a never-ending saga.
meanings.sent4: The tediousness of waiting for the bus felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent5: The tediousness of the lecture was like a heavy weight on my shoulders.

meanings.definition: The act or process of being tedious.
meanings.sent1: Her constant complaints added to the tediousness of the situation.
meanings.sent2: The tediousness of the assembly line work made the day drag on.
meanings.sent3: The tediousness of untangling Christmas lights became a comical challenge.
meanings.sent4: The tediousness of painting the fence was like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The tediousness of the paperwork felt like swimming through molasses.
